testcase.classname: User should be able to purchase products
testcase.name: user should be able to make purchases
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to "shoppingUrl" page..................................passed And "student" logins with valid credentials.................................passed And user adds "2" of "Tomato" into cart.....................................passed And user proceeds to checkout...............................................passed When user places order from "United States".................................passed Then verify that "Thank you, your order has been placed successfully You'll be redirected to Home page shortly!!" is "Thank you, your order has been placed successfully&&&You'll be redirected to Home page shortly!!".passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to purchase products
testcase.name: user should be able to make purchases 2
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to "shoppingUrl" page..................................passed And "teacher" logins with valid credentials.................................passed And user adds "5" of "Pumpkin" into cart....................................passed And user proceeds to checkout...............................................passed When user places order from "Turkey"........................................passed Then verify that "unsuccessfully" is "Thank you, your order has been placed successfully&&&You'll be redirected to Home page shortly!!".passed
